items.title: Bank of America raises gold forecast, noting Trump threat to Federal Reserve independence
items.description: The Wall Street investment bank said it remains bullish on gold, "with a short-/medium-term target of US$4,000/oz."

items.description: Shares have pulled back more than 30% in 2025.

items.description: Shares have ticked down about 3% in 2025.
